item.description:
UPDATE ON MEETING.
Our speaker will not be able to join us. He has a schedule change. They are making him a company instructor (check airman) and he has to be in DC.

Instead, I'll be providing an overhead shot using Google Earth and we can discuss options for off field landings departing all runways at FIT. Bring your thoughts on this. Locations are limited.

Also, we have the movie "Gathering of Legends". We can view this after our business and discussion. This movie was made a couple years ago in Columbus Ohio during gatherings of P-51's and other legend aircraft. Should be quite interesting.

We'll also be discussing the possible Wings and Wheels from our last meeting.

AirVentue raffle tickets are still on sale for The Big Weekend... Drawing will be at April's meeting.... Here's your chance to attend the Greatest Aviation event in the world..

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

See you all soon.
Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454 March Meetup UPDATE
